description:
Two men are visited in dreams by their dead fathers..  Rats fight it out in the sumo ring.  A mysterious old man makes magic with watermelons.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Filial Devotion in Dreams / Rat Sumo / A Story of Stolen Melons
Yume no Koushin / Nezumi no Sumou / Uri o Nusumareta Hanashi
夢の孝心 / ねずみのすもう / 瓜を盗まれた話
